name: Guitar
description: A versatile and popular instrument that can be played in various genres.

name: Piano
description: A foundational instrument that can help develop musical skills and understanding.

name: Violin
description: A beautiful string instrument that requires dedication and practice to master.

name: Drums
description: Learn the rhythms and beats that drive the music.

name: Flute
description: Explore melodies and create enchanting tunes with this wind instrument.

name: Trumpet
description: Master the brass instrument and create vibrant sounds.

name: Ukulele
description: A smaller and easier-to-learn string instrument that's great for beginners.

name: Saxophone
description: Discover the world of jazz and other genres with this expressive woodwind instrument.

name: Cello
description: Dive into the rich tones of this majestic string instrument.

name: Clarinet
description: Learn to play this versatile woodwind instrument that can be used in classical and jazz music.

name: Djembe
description: Experience the joy of playing traditional African rhythms on this hand drum.

name: Xylophone
description: Learn to play melodies and harmonies on this percussive instrument.
